name: Stellar Patrol - Space Combat Sim
description: Become part of a vast universe filled with an infinite number of adventures. You are an elite pilot, the last to escape the burning wreck of your carrier, destroyed in an underhanded attack against the forces of good.  Track down and destroy the betrayer in a series of missions that will take you throughout the galaxy.  It's your choice, hero or pirate.   Dodge through nebula's, asteroid and mine fields while piloting the best fighters in the galaxy.  The action will continue, as you travel through the 39 known star systems.  Whatever motivates you, the galaxy will respond. Strap in... your  destiny is waiting.
